info.name: Tradecloud Buyer Demo
info.description: This collection contains requests illustrating how to use the Tradecloud API as a Buyer.

request.description:
Before sending this request:

1. Make sure you are logged in as a Buyer and the Bearer Token is set in the Authorization header.
2. Make sure the `companyId` and `supplierAccountNumber` are set correctly.
3. Choose a unique `purchaseOrderNumber` to issue a new order. Otherwise, the order will be reissued.

See also [the api-connector API specs](https://swagger-ui.accp.tradecloud1.com/?url=https://api.accp.tradecloud1.com/v2/api-connector/specs.yaml#/buyer-endpoints/sendOrderByBuyerRoute)
